item.description: Meet at NERD at 1PM and ride until 3:30 or 4. Heading into Cambridge down MA Ave and stopping for coffee at Peet's in Harvard Square. Then either reversing course and heading down Memorial Drive all the way to MA Ave and taking a right into Back Bay....OR sneaking over into Brighton and Brookline and going past Fenway to see all the happy people filtering out of the Yankees vs. Red Sox game.
item.why: The weather has broken and we need to hear the gentle buzz of our little machines.
item.name: Buzz around town (Boston/Cambridge) tomorrow - Sun, April 10
